website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful sugar bowl by an impressive company with an exceptional warranty — but the style and price aren't for everyone.
pros: Crafted in porcelain with the superior quality that's characteristic of Lenox
Backed by the company's lifetime breakage replacement guarantee
cons: This is a pricey piece, and the elegant design is impractical for some customers

customer_reviews.title: Butterfly Meadow by Lenox Sugarbowl
customer_reviews.text: Lovely Lenox China sugar bowl. Crafted perfectly for comfort when picking up. Design very delicate flowers and butterflies. Pretty rosebud on lid to act as lid handle. Have the Meadow butterfly collection and it is perfect to dress up a table. Brings lots of joy.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: This is so pretty. Picture does not do it justice
customer_reviews.author: Bonita Lummus

customer_reviews.title: A LOVELY SUGAR BOWL
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new sugar bowl and since I had 4 of the mugs I thought "Why Not". It has a pink rosebud on the lid and is easy to grasp (my previous bowl had a tiny lid handle always slipping out of my fingers). It was well packaged and arrived safely. Such a pretty pattern, wish I had the whole set.
customer_reviews.author: A.. Vidrick

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My mother-in-law asked for a bunch of Butterfly Meadow for upcoming holidays. This is one item on her wish list. It's nice, not overly frilly, but absolutely feminine and girlish. I suspect shes trying to amass a tea service that my little girls will really like, because we always do tea when we visit her. My girls will love this. But for an adult...well, its just too precious for me. That said, there are other elements of Butterfly Meadow that I do like a lot.
customer_reviews.author: AmandaR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match!
customer_reviews.text: Sugar bowl is beautiful and of course matches the set of the Lenox Butterfly Meadow "original" pattern. I love the pale rose bud on the lid.
customer_reviews.author: W. B.

customer_reviews.title: This item is so delicate and beautiful! I classy addition to my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This item is so delicate and beautiful! I classy addition to my kitchen. I bought the canisters AFTER I bought the sugar bowl !! The pattern and overall appearance reminds me of my Grandmother - she would definitely love this!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Blaise

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sugar bowl because my daughter bought the creamer for me. It is beautiful on both sides as pictured
customer_reviews.author: lillian

customer_reviews.title: Lenox is Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful, great quality for a great price here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: BECA G

customer_reviews.title: it was not and was a great surprise for her
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my mother for Christmas as her old one was broken. Although I was worried about it being broken in transit, it was not and was a great surprise for her.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful creamer
customer_reviews.text: Great sugar bowl. Also got the creamer and called it a sugar bowl too. Got themboth at the same time. Definitely recommed this store
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L. Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Bought the creamer too.
customer_reviews.text: Watch the price on this bowl. First saw it at a great price. I didn't snatch it up and came back to see the price became something ridiculous. Held off and it came back down so I pounced on it. Chuckling OL. Pretty, functional and it matches my everyday dishes. I love Lenox Butterfly Meadow.
customer_reviews.author: Kim T

customer_reviews.title: Great sugar bowl.
customer_reviews.text: Looks really pretty - easy to pick up with the handles and can hold quite a bit of sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Patty C.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and fragile
customer_reviews.text: caution- porcelain breaks very easily. treat with respect, don't let your cats jump up on the table and knock it down. guess how i know this....second time purchasing. i love butterfly meadow by lenox, but all my top designs seem to break off over the years.
customer_reviews.author: valeri

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I have almost the whole set. I keep adding what I dont have a little at a time. I just loves this set it's durable, fancy, but not so fancy that you only bring out on special ocations. It's defiantly an everyday dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty and has a wide enough opening to fit a 1/4 measuring cup. Nice balance to it too.
customer_reviews.author: EllenTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: A bit Small
customer_reviews.text: However, it looks nice with the dishes. It could be larger. Also, these Butterfly Meadow items are overpriced. You have to look for them when they're on sale.
customer_reviews.author: hunnebee

customer_reviews.title: Love this beautiful sugar bowl
customer_reviews.text: Love this beautiful sugar bowl...it matches the tea cups that I also bought and is a great item to have when serving tea! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Wood, ND

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my mother. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: sweet!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a nice addition to our dish collection. The rose on top is really a clever touch to this sugar bowl. The only surprise on this product is its size. It is larger than I pictured it. Other than that, it is very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Alice C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it, perfect size!  Not too big or too small. Looks lovely on the table or counter.
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous and perfectly sized sugar bowl. I bought another just in case I break this one. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Smith

customer_reviews.title: Butterfly Sugar Bowl
customer_reviews.text: Botancial vs. country. I bought this as a gift for my mother in law, and she really enjoys it - so I bought the matching creamer for her. Will also buy the set for myself.
customer_reviews.author: CarolinaChristian

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Durable.
customer_reviews.text: I have many pieces in this design. I absolutely Love the fine porcelain but very durable product. I highly recommend any of this design & the Lenox name to ALL.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Long

customer_reviews.title: Delightful
customer_reviews.text: This beautiful suger bowl looks lovely when setting out your tea or coffee~ You can use it for sugar or for lemon wedges if you take your tea with lemon :)
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Add to my set
customer_reviews.text: I got the starter set and wanted to add this piece. This was a good deal and it arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mickeyhouse314

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE
customer_reviews.text: I like this collection very much. I hope others enjoy it as much as I am hoping to. Lenox did good!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Y Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Sugar Bowl
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful addition to our set. It is well designed and beautiful. Highly Recommend to anyone that has the set. My girl loves this set!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony LoCicero

customer_reviews.title: Sugar is bad for u but sugar bowl is good for counter!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It's a modern size sugar bowl and it's helping me use less; because somebody says "sugar's bad for you."
customer_reviews.author: joe k...

customer_reviews.title: Durable and pretty!
customer_reviews.text: These dishes are great! I love the fact that they are micraveable and dishwater safe. Also, beautiful,too. My Sugar bowl was broken and I just had to replace it. I buy my dishes on sale. The have good deals often.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Herring

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer than the picture. Design is more subtle and delicate, and the handle on the lid is adorable.
customer_reviews.author: jean

product_meta.title: Lenox Butterfly Meadow Double Handled Sugar Bowl with Lid, White -
product_meta.description:
The most popular casual dinnerware collection in America, Butterfly Meadow is truly a contemporary mix and match classic. Inspired by the artistry of Louise Le Luyer, there are many delightful pattern varriations to choose from, each offering an exquisite array of butterflies, blooms and other wonders of nature, all rendered in a soft color palette. Crafted of the finest Lenox porcelain, Butterfly Meadow is the perfect choice for today. All of the dinnerware is safe for use in the dishwasher, the microwave and guarantees superior freezer to oven to table performance. Designed for chip-resistant durability, Butterfly Meadow will take a cherished place in your home for many years and offers the opportunity to expand your collection with the incredible range of dining, decor and gift giving choices available. Best of all, this versatile, stylish and fun collection is created by Lenox, America's first name in home entertaining. Known around the world for offering a unique combination of design, artistry and superior quality for over 125 years, Lenox has unmatched durability and is backed up by a lifetime replacement program to guarantee many years of enjoyment. This giftboxed sugar bowl is just as sweet as the sugar inside. Matching cream pitcher and teapot also available.

AMAZON.COM
Adorably old-fashioned in shape, this Butterfly Meadow sugar bowl from Lenox adds garden freshness to your tea and coffee service. Crafted from fine porcelain, the bowl features a handsome foot, a scalloped rim, a snug-fitting lid, and double handles. The decorative imagery, created by Lenox artist Louise Le Luyer, is both delicate and vibrant. The lid, decorated with tiny vines, features a pale pink rosebud as a handle, while flowers, butterflies, and a ladybug circle the body. The bowl can go from the freezer to the oven to the table and is safe for use in the microwave and dishwasher. It measures 6-1/2 by 4-1/4 by 5 inches and is covered by Lenox's lifetime replacement policy. A matching teapot and creamer are also available. --Emily Bedard
feature_bullets: Made of chip-resistant Lenox white porcelain
Florals and butterflies in exquisite colors adorn each scalloped piece
Sugar bowl with lid is 5" tall to the top of the floral finial, 4" wide and giftboxed
Guaranteed by the Lenox Lifetime Breakage Replacement Program
Lidded sugar bowl with garden-inspired imagery
Matching teapot and creamer also available

specifications.Customer Reviews: 5.0 out of 5 stars71 ratings5.0 out of 5 stars
